A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No idea what Rian Johnson was smoking when he wrote this.  It contained a whole bunch of plot holes\, awkward scenes\, poorly executed ideas\, and really corny philosophical concepts that didn't really connect to the plot.  Out of all the other star wars movies\, this one is the worst.  Even out of most movies in general\, it was pretty much bad all around.  The scenes don't really build you up to anything that makes sense overall\, I just felt like they were throwing way too many ideas at me at the same time without going into enough details.  As a star wars movie\, they sort of ruined a bunch of characters from the originals which really turned me off.
